name: Baldi's Basics and Education and Learning Remade
name_original: Baldi's Basics and Education and Learning Remade
description:
Baldi's Basics is made by Mystman12. This is just a remade version of it with some Baldi's Basics Plus features in it like Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered. Note the assets aren't mine. I just made this game for fun!

WARNING! 

Before you Download This game has bugs and glitches and the AI bugs out sometimes. And this is a Development Build so things you see here is unfinished and might subject to change!

Thank you for Checking out my own recreation of Baldi's Basics Classic!

Check out the original game here: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics
